messages.id:
This interactive tool will walk you through migration of Curio.
Press Ctrl+C to exit at any time.
messages.message:
This interactive tool will walk you through migration of Curio.
Press Ctrl+C to exit at any time.
messages.translation:
此互动工具将引导您完成Curio的迁移。
随时按Ctrl+C退出。

messages.id: This tool confirms each action it does.
messages.message: This tool confirms each action it does.
messages.translation: 此工具确认其执行的每个操作。
在终端中按下Ctrl+C
正在验证Yugabyte中的扇区是否存在。
验证扇区时出错：{Error}
已验证扇区。找到了{I}个扇区。

messages.id: Never remove the database info from the config.toml for lotus-miner as it avoids double PoSt.
messages.message: Never remove the database info from the config.toml for lotus-miner as it avoids double PoSt.
messages.translation: 从config.toml中永远不要删除lotus-miner的数据库信息，因为它避免了双PoSt。

messages.id: Enter the info to connect to your Yugabyte database installation (https://download.yugabyte.com/)
messages.message: Enter the info to connect to your Yugabyte database installation (https://download.yugabyte.com/)
messages.translation: 输入连接到您的Yugabyte数据库安装的信息（https://download.yugabyte.com/）
主机：{Hosts_}
端口：{Port}
用户名：{Username}
密码：{Password}
数据库：{Database}

messages.id: Continue to connect and update schema.
messages.message: Continue to connect and update schema.
messages.translation: 继续连接和更新架构。

messages.id: Database config error occurred, abandoning migration: {Error}
messages.message: Database config error occurred, abandoning migration: {Error}
messages.translation: 发生数据库配置错误，放弃迁移：{Error}
输入Yugabyte数据库主机（S）
未提供主机
输入Yugabyte数据库 {Stringport_username_password_databasei_1}
未提供值
连接到Yugabyte数据库时出错：{Error}

messages.id: Connected to Yugabyte. Schema is current.
messages.message: Connected to Yugabyte. Schema is current.
messages.translation: 已连接到Yugabyte。模式是当前的。
编码config.toml时出错：{Error}
读取config.toml文件模式时出错：{Error}
写入config.toml时出错：{Error}
重新启动Lotus Miner。
已连接到Yugabyte

messages.id: Select the location of your lotus-miner config directory?
messages.message: Select the location of your lotus-miner config directory?
messages.translation: 选择您的lotus-miner配置目录的位置？
其他

messages.id: Enter the path to the configuration directory used by lotus-miner
messages.message: Enter the path to the configuration directory used by lotus-miner
messages.translation: 输入lotus-miner使用的配置目录的路径
未提供路径，放弃迁移

messages.id: Cannot read the config.toml file in the provided directory, Error: {Error}
messages.message: Cannot read the config.toml file in the provided directory, Error: {Error}
messages.translation: 无法读取提供的目录中的config.toml文件，错误：{Error}
读取矿工配置
完成步骤：{Step}

messages.id: This interactive tool migrates lotus-miner to Curio in 5 minutes.
messages.translation: 这个交互式工具可以在5分钟内将lotus-miner迁移到Curio。
messages.message: This interactive tool migrates lotus-miner to Curio in 5 minutes.

messages.id: Each step needs your confirmation and can be reversed. Press Ctrl+C to exit at any time.
messages.translation: 每一步都需要您的确认，并且可以撤销。随时按Ctrl+C退出。
messages.message: Each step needs your confirmation and can be reversed. Press Ctrl+C to exit at any time.

messages.id: Use the arrow keys to navigate: ↓ ↑ → ←
messages.translation: 使用箭头键进行导航：↓ ↑ → ←
messages.message: Use the arrow keys to navigate: ↓ ↑ → ←

messages.translation: Lotus-Miner到Curio迁移。

messages.id: Try the web interface with  for further guided improvements.
messages.translation: 尝试使用网页界面进行进一步的指导改进。
messages.message: Try the web interface with  for further guided improvements.

messages.id: You can now migrate your market node ({Boost}), if applicable.
messages.translation: 如果适用，您现在可以迁移您的市场节点({Boost})。
messages.message: You can now migrate your market node ({Boost}), if applicable.

messages.translation: 正在将config.toml迁移到数据库。

messages.id: Error reading from database: {Error}. Aborting Migration.
messages.translation: 读取数据库时出错：{Error}。正在中止迁移。
messages.message: Error reading from database: {Error}. Aborting Migration.

messages.translation: 无法读取API：{Error}。正在中止迁移

messages.id: Error saving config to layer: {Error}. Aborting Migration
messages.translation: 保存配置到层时出错：{Error}。正在中止迁移
messages.message: Error saving config to layer: {Error}. Aborting Migration

messages.id: Protocol Labs wants to improve the software you use. Tell the team you're using Curio.
messages.translation: Protocol Labs希望改进您使用的软件。告诉团队您正在使用Curio。
messages.message: Protocol Labs wants to improve the software you use. Tell the team you're using Curio.

messages.id: Select what you want to share with the Curio team.
messages.translation: 选择您想与Curio团队分享的内容。
messages.message: Select what you want to share with the Curio team.

messages.id: Individual Data: Miner ID, Curio version, net ({Mainnet} or {Testnet}). Signed.
messages.translation: 个人数据：矿工ID、Curio版本、网络({Mainnet}或{Testnet})。已签名。
messages.message: Individual Data: Miner ID, Curio version, net ({Mainnet} or {Testnet}). Signed.

messages.id: Aggregate-Anonymous: version, net, and Miner power (bucketed).
messages.translation: 聚合-匿名：版本、网络和矿工功率（分桶）。
messages.message: Aggregate-Anonymous: version, net, and Miner power (bucketed).

messages.id: Hint: I am someone running Curio on net.
messages.translation: 提示：我是在网络上运行Curio的人。
messages.message: Hint: I am someone running Curio on net.

messages.translation: 没有。
中止剩余步骤。
连接到莲花节点时出错：{Error}
获取矿工功率时出错：{Error}
整理消息时出错：{Error}
获取矿工信息时出错：{Error}
签署消息时出错：{Error}
发送消息时出错：{Error}
发送消息时出错：状态{Status}，消息：
消息已发送。
文档：

messages.id: The '{Base}' layer stores common configuration. All curio instances can include it in their {__layers} argument.
messages.translation: '{Base}'层存储通用配置。所有Curio实例都可以在其{__layers}参数中包含它。
messages.message: The '{Base}' layer stores common configuration. All curio instances can include it in their {__layers} argument.

messages.id: You can add other layers for per-machine configuration changes.
messages.translation: 您可以添加其他层进行每台机器的配置更改。
messages.message: You can add other layers for per-machine configuration changes.

messages.translation: 加入Filecoin {Slack}中的{Fil_curio_help}寻求帮助。

messages.id: Join {Fil_curio_dev} in Filecoin {Slack} to follow development and feedback!
messages.translation: 加入Filecoin {Slack}中的{Fil_curio_dev}来跟踪开发和反馈！
messages.message: Join {Fil_curio_dev} in Filecoin {Slack} to follow development and feedback!

messages.id: Want PoST redundancy? Run many Curio instances with the '{Post}' layer.
messages.translation: 需要PoST冗余？使用'{Post}'层运行多个Curio实例。
messages.message: Want PoST redundancy? Run many Curio instances with the '{Post}' layer.

messages.id: Point your browser to your web GUI to complete setup with {Boost} and advanced featues.
messages.translation: 将您的浏览器指向您的网络GUI，以使用{Boost}和高级功能完成设置。
messages.message: Point your browser to your web GUI to complete setup with {Boost} and advanced featues.

messages.id: For SPs with multiple Miner IDs, run 1 migration per lotus-miner all to the same 1 database. The cluster will serve all Miner IDs.
messages.translation: 对于具有多个矿工ID的SP，针对所有lotus-miner运行1次迁移到同一个数据库。集群将服务所有矿工ID。
messages.message: For SPs with multiple Miner IDs, run 1 migration per lotus-miner all to the same 1 database. The cluster will serve all Miner IDs.

messages.id: Please start {Lotus_miner} now that database credentials are in {Toml}.
messages.translation: 现在数据库凭证在{Toml}中，请启动{Lotus_miner}。
messages.message: Please start {Lotus_miner} now that database credentials are in {Toml}.

messages.id: Waiting for {Lotus_miner} to write sectors into Yugabyte.
messages.translation: 等待{Lotus_miner}将扇区写入Yugabyte。
messages.message: Waiting for {Lotus_miner} to write sectors into Yugabyte.

messages.id: The sectors are in the database. The database is ready for {Curio}.
messages.translation: 扇区在数据库中。数据库已准备好用于{Curio}。
messages.message: The sectors are in the database. The database is ready for {Curio}.

messages.id: Now shut down lotus-miner and move the systems to {Curio}.
messages.translation: 现在关闭lotus-miner并将系统移至{Curio}。
messages.message: Now shut down lotus-miner and move the systems to {Curio}.

messages.translation: 按回车继续
中止迁移。
扇区已验证。发现了{I}个扇区位置。

messages.id: Press return to update {Toml} with Yugabyte info. Backup the file now.
messages.translation: 按回车更新{Toml}以获取Yugabyte信息。现在备份文件。
messages.message: Press return to update {Toml} with Yugabyte info. Backup the file now.

messages.id: To start, ensure your sealing pipeline is drained and shut-down lotus-miner.
messages.translation: 开始之前，请确保您的密封管道已排空并关闭lotus-miner。
messages.message: To start, ensure your sealing pipeline is drained and shut-down lotus-miner.

messages.id: Enter the path to the configuration directory used by {Lotus_miner}
messages.translation: 输入{Lotus_miner}使用的配置目录的路径
messages.message: Enter the path to the configuration directory used by {Lotus_miner}

messages.translation: 步骤完成：{Step}

messages.id: Configuration 'base' was updated to include this miner's address and its wallet setup.
messages.translation: 配置'base'已更新，包含了这个矿工的地址和其钱包设置。
messages.message: Configuration 'base' was updated to include this miner's address and its wallet setup.

messages.id: Compare the configurations {Base} to {MinerAddresses0}. Changes between the miner IDs other than wallet addreses should be a new, minimal layer for runners that need it.
messages.translation: 比较配置{Base}和{MinerAddresses0}。矿工ID之间除了钱包地址的变化应该是需要的运行者的一个新的、最小的层。
messages.message: Compare the configurations {Base} to {MinerAddresses0}. Changes between the miner IDs other than wallet addreses should be a new, minimal layer for runners that need it.

messages.id: Configuration 'base' was created to include this miner's address and its wallet setup.
messages.translation: 配置'base'已创建，包括了这个矿工的地址和其钱包设置。
messages.message: Configuration 'base' was created to include this miner's address and its wallet setup.

messages.translation: 层{LayerName}已创建。
要使用配置：\n

messages.id: To run Curio: With machine or cgroup isolation, use the command (with example layer selection):
messages.translation: 运行Curio：使用机器或cgroup隔离，使用命令（附带示例层选择）：
messages.message: To run Curio: With machine or cgroup isolation, use the command (with example layer selection):

messages.id: Try the web interface with {__layersgui} for further guided improvements.
messages.translation: 尝试使用{__layersgui}的Web界面进行进一步引导式改进。
messages.message: Try the web interface with {__layersgui} for further guided improvements.

messages.translation: 连接到lotus节点时出错：{Error} {Error_1}

messages.id: could not get API info for FullNode: {Err}
messages.translation: 无法获取FullNode的API信息：{Err}
messages.message: could not get API info for FullNode: {Err}

messages.translation: 获取令牌时出错：{Error}
Filecoin {Slack} 频道：{Fil_curio_help} 和 {Fil_curio_dev}

messages.id: Start multiple Curio instances with the '{Post}' layer to redundancy.
messages.translation: 使用'{Post}'层启动多个Curio实例以实现冗余。
messages.message: Start multiple Curio instances with the '{Post}' layer to redundancy.

messages.id: One database can serve multiple miner IDs: Run a migration for each lotus-miner.
messages.translation: 一个数据库可以服务多个矿工ID：为每个lotus-miner运行迁移。
messages.message: One database can serve multiple miner IDs: Run a migration for each lotus-miner.

messages.id: Please start (or restart) {Lotus_miner} now that database credentials are in {Toml}.
messages.translation: 请立即启动（或重新启动）{Lotus_miner}，因为数据库凭据已在{Toml}中。
messages.message: Please start (or restart) {Lotus_miner} now that database credentials are in {Toml}.

messages.translation: 解释矿工ID时出错：{Error}：ID：{String}

messages.id: Enabling Sector Indexing in the database.
messages.translation: 在数据库中启用扇区索引。
messages.message: Enabling Sector Indexing in the database.

messages.translation: 扩展路径时出错：{Error}

messages.id: Could not create repo from directory: {Error}. Aborting migration
messages.translation: 无法从目录创建repo：{Error}。 中止迁移
messages.message: Could not create repo from directory: {Error}. Aborting migration

messages.id:
Could not lock miner repo. Your miner must be stopped: {Error}
 Aborting migration
messages.translation:
无法锁定矿工repo。 您的矿工必须停止：{Error}
 中止迁移
messages.message:
Could not lock miner repo. Your miner must be stopped: {Error}
 Aborting migration

messages.translation: 要使用配置：

messages.id: This interactive tool creates a new miner actor and creates the basic configuration layer for it.
messages.translation: 此交互式工具将创建一个新的矿工角色，并为其创建基本配置层。
messages.message: This interactive tool creates a new miner actor and creates the basic configuration layer for it.

messages.id: This process is partially idempotent. Once a new miner actor has been created and subsequent steps fail, the user need to run 'curio config new-cluster {Arg_1}' to finish the configuration.
messages.translation: 此过程在某种程度上是幂等的。一旦创建了新的矿工角色，并且后续步骤失败，用户需要运行'curio config new-cluster {Arg_1}'来完成配置。
messages.message: This process is partially idempotent. Once a new miner actor has been created and subsequent steps fail, the user need to run 'curio config new-cluster {Arg_1}' to finish the configuration.

messages.id: Choose if you with to create a new miner or migrate from existing Lotus-Miner
messages.translation: 选择您是否要创建新矿工或从现有的 Lotus-Miner 迁移
messages.message: Choose if you with to create a new miner or migrate from existing Lotus-Miner

messages.translation: 从现有的 Lotus-Miner 迁移
创建一个新的矿工
新矿工初始化完成。

messages.id: Migrating lotus-miner config.toml to Curio in-database configuration.
messages.translation: 将 lotus-miner config.toml 迁移到 Curio 的数据库配置中。
messages.message: Migrating lotus-miner config.toml to Curio in-database configuration.

messages.translation: 获取 API 时出错：{Error}

messages.id: The Curio team wants to improve the software you use. Tell the team you're using `{Curio}`.
messages.translation: Curio 团队希望改进您使用的软件。告诉团队您正在使用 `{Curio}`。
messages.message: The Curio team wants to improve the software you use. Tell the team you're using `{Curio}`.

messages.id: Individual Data: Miner ID, Curio version, chain ({Mainnet} or {Calibration}). Signed.
messages.translation: 个人数据：矿工 ID，Curio 版本，链（{Mainnet} 或 {Calibration}）。签名。
messages.message: Individual Data: Miner ID, Curio version, chain ({Mainnet} or {Calibration}). Signed.

messages.id: Aggregate-Anonymous: version, chain, and Miner power (bucketed).
messages.translation: 聚合-匿名：版本，链和矿工算力（分桶）。
messages.message: Aggregate-Anonymous: version, chain, and Miner power (bucketed).

messages.id: Hint: I am someone running Curio on whichever chain.
messages.translation: 提示：我是在任何链上运行 Curio 的人。
messages.message: Hint: I am someone running Curio on whichever chain.

messages.id: Press return to update {Toml} with Yugabyte info. A Backup file will be written to that folder before changes are made.
messages.translation: 按回车键更新 {Toml} 以包含 Yugabyte 信息。在进行更改之前，将在该文件夹中写入备份文件。
messages.message: Press return to update {Toml} with Yugabyte info. A Backup file will be written to that folder before changes are made.

messages.translation: 创建备份文件时出错：{Error}
读取 config.toml 时出错：{Error}
写入备份文件时出错：{Error}
关闭备份文件时出错：{Error}
初始化新的矿工角色。

messages.id: Enter the info to create a new miner
messages.translation: 输入创建新矿工所需的信息
messages.message: Enter the info to create a new miner

messages.translation: 所有者地址：{String}
工作地址：{String}
发送者地址：{String}
扇区大小: {Ssize}
置信度时期: {Confidence}

messages.id: Continue to verify the addresses and create a new miner actor.
messages.translation: 继续验证地址并创建新的矿工角色。
messages.message: Continue to verify the addresses and create a new miner actor.

messages.translation: 矿工创建错误发生: {Error}
输入所有者地址
未提供地址
解析地址失败: {Error}
输入 {Stringworker_senderi_1} 地址
输入扇区大小
解析扇区大小失败: {Error}
输入置信度
解析置信度失败: {Error}

messages.id: Failed to create the miner actor: {Error}
messages.translation: 创建矿工角色失败: {Error}
messages.message: Failed to create the miner actor: {Error}

messages.translation: 矿工 {String} 创建成功
无法访问数据库: {Error}

messages.id: Error connecting to full node API: {Error}
messages.translation: 连接到完整节点 API 时发生错误: {Error}
messages.message: Error connecting to full node API: {Error}

messages.translation: 预初始化步骤完成

messages.id: Failed to generate random bytes for secret: {Error}
messages.translation: 生成密码的随机字节失败: {Error}
messages.message: Failed to generate random bytes for secret: {Error}

messages.id: Please do not run guided-setup again as miner creation is not idempotent. You need to run 'curio config new-cluster {String}' to finish the configuration
messages.translation: 请不要再次运行引导设置，因为矿工创建不是幂等的。 您需要运行 'curio config new-cluster {String}' 来完成配置。
messages.message: Please do not run guided-setup again as miner creation is not idempotent. You need to run 'curio config new-cluster {String}' to finish the configuration

messages.id: Failed to get API info for FullNode: {Err}
messages.translation: 无法获取 FullNode 的 API 信息: {Err}
messages.message: Failed to get API info for FullNode: {Err}

messages.id: Failed to verify the auth token from daemon node: {Error}
messages.translation: 无法验证来自守护进程节点的授权令牌: {Error}
messages.message: Failed to verify the auth token from daemon node: {Error}

messages.translation: 无法编码配置: {Error}
无法生成默认配置: {Error}

messages.id: Failed to insert 'base' config layer in database: {Error}
messages.translation: 无法将 'base' 配置层插入数据库: {Error}
messages.message: Failed to insert 'base' config layer in database: {Error}

messages.id: Failed to insert '{String}' config layer in database: {Error}
messages.translation: 无法将 '{String}' 配置层插入数据库: {Error}
messages.message: Failed to insert '{String}' config layer in database: {Error}

messages.translation: 新的 Curio 配置层 '{String}' 已创建

messages.id: This process is partially idempotent. Once a new miner actor has been created and subsequent steps fail, the user need to run 'curio config new-cluster < miner ID >' to finish the configuration.
messages.translation: 该过程部分幂等。一旦创建了新的矿工角色，并且随后的步骤失败，用户需要运行 'curio config new-cluster < 矿工 ID >' 来完成配置。
messages.message: This process is partially idempotent. Once a new miner actor has been created and subsequent steps fail, the user need to run 'curio config new-cluster < miner ID >' to finish the configuration.

messages.translation: 置信度时期

messages.id: Increase reliability using redundancy: start multiple machines with at-least the post layer: 'curio run --layers=post'
messages.translation: 通过冗余增加可靠性：使用至少后层启动多台机器：'curio run --layers=post'
messages.message: Increase reliability using redundancy: start multiple machines with at-least the post layer: 'curio run --layers=post'

messages.translation: 我想要：

messages.id: Configuration 'base' was updated to include this miner's address
messages.translation: 配置 'base' 已更新以包含此矿工的地址
messages.message: Configuration 'base' was updated to include this miner's address

messages.translation: 无法加载基本配置: {Error}
加载基本配置失败: {Error}
重新生成基本配置失败: {Error}

messages.id: Failed to load base config from database: {Error}
messages.translation: 从数据库加载基本配置失败：{Error}
messages.message: Failed to load base config from database: {Error}

messages.translation: 解析基本配置失败：{Error}

messages.id: Try the web interface with {Rendercurio_run___layersgui} for further guided improvements.
messages.translation: 尝试使用{Rendercurio_run___layersgui}的网络界面进行更进一步的指导性改进。
messages.message: Try the web interface with {Rendercurio_run___layersgui} for further guided improvements.

messages.id: Now shut down lotus-miner and lotus-worker and use run {Rendercurio_run} instead.
messages.translation: 现在关闭lotus-miner和lotus-worker，改为使用{Rendercurio_run}运行。
messages.message: Now shut down lotus-miner and lotus-worker and use run {Rendercurio_run} instead.

messages.id: Configuration 'base' was updated to include this miner's address ({MinerAddress}) and its wallet setup.
messages.translation: 'base'配置已更新，包括该矿工的地址（{MinerAddress}）及其钱包设置。
messages.message: Configuration 'base' was updated to include this miner's address ({MinerAddress}) and its wallet setup.

messages.id: Configuration 'base' was created to resemble this lotus-miner's config.toml .
messages.translation: 'base'配置已创建，以类似于这个lotus-miner的config.toml。
messages.message: Configuration 'base' was created to resemble this lotus-miner's config.toml .

messages.id: Unmigratable sectors found. Do you want to continue?
messages.translation: 发现无法迁移的扇区。您想要继续吗？
messages.message: Unmigratable sectors found. Do you want to continue?

messages.translation: 是的，继续
不，中止
正在迁移{NSectors}个扇区的元数据。

messages.id: Where should we save your database config file?
messages.translation: 我们应该把你的数据库配置文件保存在哪里？
messages.message: Where should we save your database config file?

messages.translation: 写入文件错误: {Error}
尝试使用{Rendercurio_run___layersgui}的网页界面

messages.id: For more servers, copy curio.env to /etc/curio.env and add the CURIO_LAYERS env to assign purposes.
messages.translation: 对于更多服务器，将curio.env复制到/etc/curio.env并添加CURIO_LAYERS环境变量以分配用途。
messages.message: For more servers, copy curio.env to /etc/curio.env and add the CURIO_LAYERS env to assign purposes.

messages.translation: 所有者钱包: {String}
工人钱包: {String}
发送者钱包: {String}
选择扇区大小
64 GiB

messages.id:
Analyze and display the layout of batch sealer threads on your CPU.

It provides detailed information about CPU utilization for batch sealing operations, including core allocation, thread
distribution for different batch sizes.
messages.translation:
分析并显示CPU上批量封装线程的布局。

提供有关批量封装操作的CPU利用率的详细信息，包括核心分配和不同批量大小的线程分布。
messages.message:
Analyze and display the layout of batch sealer threads on your CPU.

It provides detailed information about CPU utilization for batch sealing operations, including core allocation, thread
distribution for different batch sizes.

messages.translation: 生成 supra_seal 配置

messages.id:
Generate a supra_seal configuration for a given batch size.

This command outputs a configuration expected by SupraSeal. Main purpose of this command is for debugging and testing.
The config can be used directly with SupraSeal binaries to test it without involving Curio.
messages.translation:
为指定的批量大小生成 supra_seal 配置。

此命令输出 SupraSeal 所需的配置，主要用于调试和测试。配置可以直接用于 SupraSeal 二进制文件进行测试，而无需涉及 Curio。
messages.message:
Generate a supra_seal configuration for a given batch size.

This command outputs a configuration expected by SupraSeal. Main purpose of this command is for debugging and testing.
The config can be used directly with SupraSeal binaries to test it without involving Curio.

设置日志级别
[级别]

messages.id:
Set the log level for logging systems:

   The system flag can be specified multiple times.

   eg) log set-level --system chain --system chainxchg debug

   Available Levels:
   debug
   info
   warn
   error

   Environment Variables:
   GOLOG_LOG_LEVEL - Default log level for all log systems
   GOLOG_LOG_FMT   - Change output log format (json, nocolor)
   GOLOG_FILE      - Write logs to file
   GOLOG_OUTPUT    - Specify whether to output to file, stderr, stdout or a combination, i.e. file+stderr
messages.translation:
为日志系统设置日志级别：

 系统标志可以多次指定。

 例如) log set-level --system chain --system chainxchg debug

 可用级别：
 debug
 info
 warn
 error

 环境变量：
 GOLOG_LOG_LEVEL - 所有日志系统的默认日志级别
 GOLOG_LOG_FMT   - 更改输出日志格式 (json, nocolor)
 GOLOG_FILE      - 将日志写入文件
 GOLOG_OUTPUT    - 指定是否输出到文件、stderr、stdout 或组合，例如 file+stderr
messages.message:
Set the log level for logging systems:

   The system flag can be specified multiple times.

   eg) log set-level --system chain --system chainxchg debug

   Available Levels:
   debug
   info
   warn
   error

   Environment Variables:
   GOLOG_LOG_LEVEL - Default log level for all log systems
   GOLOG_LOG_FMT   - Change output log format (json, nocolor)
   GOLOG_FILE      - Write logs to file
   GOLOG_OUTPUT    - Specify whether to output to file, stderr, stdout or a combination, i.e. file+stderr

管理扇区存储

messages.id:
Sectors can be stored across many filesystem paths. These
commands provide ways to manage the storage a Curio node will use to store sectors
long term for proving (references as 'store') as well as how sectors will be
stored while moving through the sealing pipeline (references as 'seal').
messages.translation: 扇区可以存储在多个文件系统路径中。这些命令提供了管理 Curio 节点用于长期存储和证明的存储方法（参考为“store”），以及封装过程中扇区的存储方式（参考为“seal”）。
messages.message:
Sectors can be stored across many filesystem paths. These
commands provide ways to manage the storage a Curio node will use to store sectors
long term for proving (references as 'store') as well as how sectors will be
stored while moving through the sealing pipeline (references as 'seal').

messages.translation: 附加本地存储路径
[路径]

messages.id:
Storage can be attached to a Curio node using this command. The storage volume
list is stored local to the Curio node in storage.json set in curio run. We do not
recommend manually modifying this value without further understanding of the
storage system.

Each storage volume contains a configuration file which describes the
capabilities of the volume. When the '--init' flag is provided, this file will
be created using the additional flags.

Weight
A high weight value means data will be more likely to be stored in this path

Seal
Data for the sealing process will be stored here

Store
Finalized sectors that will be moved here for long term storage and be proven
over time
messages.translation:
可以使用此命令将存储附加到 Curio 节点。存储卷列表存储在本地 Curio 节点中的 storage.json 文件中，通过 curio run 设置。建议在了解存储系统之前，不要手动修改此值。

每个存储卷包含一个配置文件，该文件描述了该卷的功能。提供 '--init' 标志时，将使用其他标志创建此文件。

权重
较高的权重值意味着数据更有可能存储在此路径中

封装
封装过程的数据将存储在这里

存储
已完成的扇区将移至此处进行长期存储，并随着时间推移进行证明
messages.message:
Storage can be attached to a Curio node using this command. The storage volume
list is stored local to the Curio node in storage.json set in curio run. We do not
recommend manually modifying this value without further understanding of the
storage system.

Each storage volume contains a configuration file which describes the
capabilities of the volume. When the '--init' flag is provided, this file will
be created using the additional flags.

Weight
A high weight value means data will be more likely to be stored in this path

Seal
Data for the sealing process will be stored here

Store
Finalized sectors that will be moved here for long term storage and be proven
over time

messages.id: Set the target unseal state for a sector
messages.translation: 设置扇区的目标解封状态
messages.message: Set the target unseal state for a sector

messages.id:
Set the target unseal state for a specific sector.
   <miner-id>: The storage provider ID
   <sector-number>: The sector number
   <target-state>: The target state (true, false, or none)

   The unseal target state indicates to curio how an unsealed copy of the sector should be maintained.
	   If the target state is true, curio will ensure that the sector is unsealed.
	   If the target state is false, curio will ensure that there is no unsealed copy of the sector.
	   If the target state is none, curio will not change the current state of the sector.

   Currently when the curio will only start new unseal processes when the target state changes from another state to true.

   When the target state is false, and an unsealed sector file exists, the GC mark step will create a removal mark
   for the unsealed sector file. The file will only be removed after the removal mark is accepted.
messages.translation:
为特定扇区设置目标解封状态。
   <miner-id>: 存储提供者 ID
   <sector-number>: 扇区号
   <target-state>: 目标状态（true、false 或 none）

   解封目标状态表示 Curio 应如何维护扇区的未密封副本。
	   如果目标状态为 true，Curio 将确保扇区未密封。
	   如果目标状态为 false，Curio 将确保扇区没有未密封副本。
	   如果目标状态为 none，Curio 将不会更改扇区的当前状态。

   当前，Curio 仅在目标状态从其他状态更改为 true 时启动新的解封进程。

   当目标状态为 false 且存在未密封的扇区文件时，GC 标记步骤将为未密封的扇区文件创建一个删除标记。文件将在删除标记被接受后才会被移除。
messages.message:
Set the target unseal state for a specific sector.
   <miner-id>: The storage provider ID
   <sector-number>: The sector number
   <target-state>: The target state (true, false, or none)

   The unseal target state indicates to curio how an unsealed copy of the sector should be maintained.
	   If the target state is true, curio will ensure that the sector is unsealed.
	   If the target state is false, curio will ensure that there is no unsealed copy of the sector.
	   If the target state is none, curio will not change the current state of the sector.

   Currently when the curio will only start new unseal processes when the target state changes from another state to true.

   When the target state is false, and an unsealed sector file exists, the GC mark step will create a removal mark
   for the unsealed sector file. The file will only be removed after the removal mark is accepted.

messages.id: Check data integrity in unsealed sector files

messages.message: --machine flag in cli command should point to the node where storage to redeclare is attached

messages.id: Create a new offline verified DDO deal for Curio
messages.translation: 为 Curio 创建新的离线验证 DDO 交易。
messages.message: Create a new offline verified DDO deal for Curio

messages.id: Specify actor address for the deal
messages.translation: 请指定此交易的参与者地址。
messages.message: Specify actor address for the deal

messages.id: Remove unsealed copies of sector containing this deal
messages.translation: 删除包含此交易的扇区的未密封副本。
messages.message: Remove unsealed copies of sector containing this deal

messages.id: indicates that deal index should not be announced to the IPNI
messages.translation: 表示交易索引不应向 IPNI 公布。
messages.message: indicates that deal index should not be announced to the IPNI

messages.id: start epoch by when the deal should be proved by provider on-chain (default: 2 days from now)
messages.translation: 交易应由提供者在链上证明的起始 epoch。（默认值：从现在起 2 天）
messages.message: start epoch by when the deal should be proved by provider on-chain (default: 2 days from now)

messages.id: Provides a sample of CIDs from an indexed piece
messages.translation: 提供索引片段的 CID 示例。
messages.message: Provides a sample of CIDs from an indexed piece

messages.translation: 片段 CID
以 JSON 格式输出

messages.id: Name of the Postgres database in Yugabyte cluster
messages.translation: Yugabyte 集群中 Postgres 数据库的名称
messages.message: Name of the Postgres database in Yugabyte cluster

messages.id: Username for connecting to the Postgres database in Yugabyte cluster
messages.translation: 连接 Yugabyte 集群中 Postgres 数据库的用户名
messages.message: Username for connecting to the Postgres database in Yugabyte cluster

messages.id: Password for connecting to the Postgres database in Yugabyte cluster
messages.translation: 连接 Yugabyte 集群中 Postgres 数据库的密码
messages.message: Password for connecting to the Postgres database in Yugabyte cluster

messages.id: Port for connecting to the Postgres database in Yugabyte cluster
messages.translation: 连接 Yugabyte 集群中 Postgres 数据库的端口
messages.message: Port for connecting to the Postgres database in Yugabyte cluster

messages.id: Port for connecting to the Cassandra database in Yugabyte cluster
messages.translation: 连接 Yugabyte 集群中 Cassandra 数据库的端口
messages.message: Port for connecting to the Cassandra database in Yugabyte cluster

messages.id: Enable load balancing for connecting to the Postgres database in Yugabyte cluster
messages.translation: 为连接到 Yugabyte 集群中的 Postgres 数据库启用负载均衡
messages.message: Enable load balancing for connecting to the Postgres database in Yugabyte cluster

messages.translation: Curio 工具箱

messages.id: Updated DB with message data missing from chain node
messages.translation: 已使用链节点中缺失的消息数据更新数据库
messages.message: Updated DB with message data missing from chain node

messages.id: Update data for messages in wait queue
messages.translation: 更新等待队列中的消息数据
messages.message: Update data for messages in wait queue
